Articles.Content:
I'm looking into creating a mod that will allow for Kerbals to gain experience in multiple professions. For example,  pilots can gain Science and Engineer experience,  Scientist can gain Engineer and Pilot experience and so on... Currently I can get each profession to have one other profession.  I don't know if having all three is possible but I'm going to try. If this is something people are interested in I'll work on it. 

Anyone that has any input or can provide any help,  let me know.  

Thanks,

Galileo

Edited August 18, 2016 by Galileo
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
